layout_description: The template is structured with a main title 'PURCHASE ORDER' spanning A1:L1, followed by a subtitle 'CELEBRITY MILLENNIUM［OSAKA］' in A2:L2. The main body is divided into two conceptual columns. The left column (A-E) contains fixed supplier and buyer information (A4-A8 for supplier, A13-A18 for buyer). The right column (F-L) contains order-specific details like DATE, Invoice, Voyage, Delivery Date, Delivery Address, Payment terms, and contact information (J4-L4, J5-K5, J6-L6, F8-K8, F9-L12, F13-J15). Key merged cells in this section include K4:L4 (DATE value), K6:L6 (Voyage value), F8:G8 (Delivery Date label), H8:J8 (Delivery Date value), F9:G9 (Delivery Address label), H9:L9 (Delivery Address value), F13:G13 (Payment Date label), H13:J13 (Payment Date value), F15:G15 (Contact label), H15:J15 (Contact value). A 'TOTAL:' label is in F16:G18, with its value in H16:J18, which is a display of the grand total. The product table starts at Row 20. Its headers span two rows (20-21) with significant merged cells: A20:A21 (NO.), B20:B21 (PO No.), C20:E20 (Product（商品名）), F20:G20 (Description), H20:I20 (Quantity), J20:K20 (Unit price), L20:L21 (Amount(JPY)). Sub-headers for Product and Description are in row 21. The product data rows start from row 22. The totals section (Sub Total, Tax, GRAND TOTAL) is located in rows 33-35, with labels in column I, currency in J, and calculated values in column L. A footer message 'THANK YOU FOR YOUR BUSINESS!' is merged across A37:L37.

sections.name: Header
sections.description: Main title and subtitle of the purchase order.

sections.name: Supplier Information
sections.description: Details of the supplier, including name, address, and contact information. These are typically fixed for a template instance but can be configured.

sections.name: Buyer Information
sections.description: Details of the buyer, including name, address, and contact information. These are typically fixed for a template instance but can be configured.

sections.name: Order & Delivery Details
sections.description: Specifics of the order such as date, invoice number, voyage, delivery date and address, payment terms, and contact persons. This section is primarily on the right side of the template.

sections.name: Product Table
sections.description: Table listing all products being ordered, including product codes, descriptions, quantities, unit prices, and calculated amounts.

sections.name: Totals
sections.description: Summary of costs including subtotal, tax, and grand total.
